meanings.definition: A phrase or inscription in which certain letters express a date or epoch.
meanings.sent1: The ancient monument had mysterious chronograms carved into its stone walls.
meanings.sent2: The historian deciphered the chronograms to determine the age of the artifact.
meanings.sent3: The students giggled when they realized the chronograms on the tombstone spelled out the birth year of the deceased.
meanings.sent4: The chronograms on the sundial seemed to whisper secrets of time and history.
meanings.sent5: The cryptic chronograms etched in the library's cornerstone intrigued visitors with their hidden messages.
